references.reason: This paper introduces the GPT-4 model, which is fundamental since the study uses GPT-40 as the default persuadee model, and a benchmark in the evaluation.

references.paper_title: Training a helpful and harmless assistant with reinforcement learning from human feedback.
references.reason: This paper explores reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF), a key technique used to improve the safety alignment of LLMs, a central concern in the context of persuasion safety.

references.paper_title: A network-based end-to-end trainable task-oriented dialogue system.
references.reason: This study presents a core element which is a network-based end-to-end trainable task-oriented dialogue system, a critical component for creating persuasive agents.
This work introduces Mistral 7B, one of the key open-source models that are widely evaluated, thus impacting the general LLM safety research community and related applications.

references.paper_title: Llama: Open and efficient foundation language models.
references.reason: This paper presents LLaMA, which serves as a key reference as the study includes Llama-3.1-8B-Instruct and Llama-3.2-3B-Instruct as the LLM being evaluated.
